Welcome

We are so excited to see that you're interested in our free courses. These courses will give you a small insight into how our courses are in the premium community. We've made a total of 8 free courses available in each section so you can walk away with key information of each section. Our tutorials are easy to follow so sit back, relax and get crotcheting!

Note: To navigate quickly, double click the navigation links!

Hats

Like most things in crotchet, hats are not a one style for all. Not only can you have a multitiude of colours but, you can also have multiple patters Whether you want a regular bucket hat or you want to make use of granny squares, hats are fun and experimental! For this lesson, you will learn to make a spiderman themed beanie. If you miss anything, you can pause and go back as needed. If it's too quick for you, you can slow down the pace!

This lesson is taught by @chonkaycrotchet on youtube
